document_data.mainbody:
Booyagh Shekt was a spellcaster of the cult of the Absolute who lived in the Shattered Sanctum during the late 15 century DR.
Shekt had orange-brown skin and green hair she wore swept over to one side. She wore a simple cloth tunic, decorated with feathers and animals claws.
Unlike her fellow goblin cultists, Shekt was very outgoing and friendly to outsiders who came into the cults fortress.
She carried with her a large shamanistic staff decorated with the spine of some unknown creature.
